scripts.build-es2017: git remote remove origin && git remote add origin "https://github.com/h5js/ecma262.git" && git fetch --quiet origin && git checkout --quiet es2017 && mkdir "out/2017" && cp -R img "out/2017" && ecmarkup --verbose spec.html out/2017/index.html && git checkout --quiet test-travis
scripts.build-master: mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --verbose spec.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-master
scripts.build-travis: npm run clean && npm run build-master && npm run build-es2017
scripts.watch: npm run clean && mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --watch --verbose spec.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
